Package minidraw.standard

This package contains standard implementation as well as abstract base class implementations of a number of MiniDraw roles.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractFigure Abstract Figure: Base implementation of some Figure behaviour.
AbstractTool AbstractTool.
CompositeFigure A Figure that is composed of several figures.
GroupFigure A Group figure is a fully operational figure containing other figures.
ImageFigure ImageFigure Responsibility: A Figure showing an Image.
ImageManager ImageManager is a singleton class that acts as a centralized database of all images to be used in a MiniDraw application.
MiniDrawApplication MiniDraw Application.
NullGfxReporter A Null Object GfxReporter strategy.
NullTool Null tool.
SelectionTool Selection tool: Uses a internal state pattern to define what type of tool to use in the current situation.
StandardDrawing Standard implemementation of drawing.
StandardDrawingView Standard implemementation of the DrawingView role in MiniDraw.
StdViewWithBackground A drawing view that paints the background with a fixed image
 

Package minidraw.standard Description

This package contains standard implementation as well as abstract base class implementations of a number of MiniDraw roles. Author: Henrik Bærbak Christensen 2006.
